Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Racine
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th  buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Albany, Ogden, Western, 18th, Ashland and then resume their normal route at Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th  buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Albany, Ogden, Western, 18th, Ashland and then resume their normal route at Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Cermak/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Racine
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ashland, Roosevelt, Halsted and then resume their normal route at Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ashland, Roosevelt, Halsted and then resume their normal route at Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute near Cermak/Racine
ShortDescription: 60 buses temp. rerouted WB: Racine, Roosevelt, Ashland and Blue Island; EB: Blue Island, Ashland, Roosevelt, Racine and Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Cermak/Racine.

Westbound buses will operate via Racine, Roosevelt, Ashland, Blue Island and then resume their normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Blue Island, Ashland, Roosevelt, Racine, Harrison and then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 54th/Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 54th/Cermak.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
